name: Spinach Pasta and Tuna
comments: Not super fabulous, but not bad and very easy.
ingredients: 8 oz. shredded Monterey Jack cheese, divided
instructions: Cook pasta according to package directions. Drain, then stir in butter until it melts. Grease a slow cooker, then mix sour cream, cheddar cheese, half Monterey Jack and spinach together. Fold in pasta and cook on Low for 1 1/2-2 hours. Before serving, stir in tuna and top with remaining cheese. Serve immediately.
